lines.irish: Foc mí, ní fhaca mé na bastairdí
lines.english: F*ck me, I didn’t see the bastards

lines.irish: Carr dubh ina bhfolach ar ár mullach is iad taobh istigh
lines.english: Black car hiding over us with them inside

lines.irish: Seans ar bith, go bhfaighidh siad mo mhála MD
lines.english: No chance they’ll find my MD bag

lines.irish: Mar tá cóisir ann anocht ‘s níl fáilte roimh an RUC
lines.english: There’s a party tonight and the RUC’s not welcome

lines.irish: Is gan dabht, tá mise ar bís
lines.english: And without a doubt, I’m buzzing

lines.irish: Le dul síos ar an snaois arís ‘s arís
lines.english: To snort again and again

lines.irish: Is ní stopfaidh mé go maidin mar ní socraím síos
lines.english: I won’t stop ‘til morning because I don’t settle down

lines.irish: Agus fuair mé mála mór ket in ionad mo chíos
lines.english: And I got a big bag of ket instead of paying rent

lines.irish: Níl tú ag focan éisteacht liom níl seo ina focan jóc
lines.english: You’re not f*cking listening, this isn’t a f*cking joke

lines.irish: Tá mé ag iarraidh a bheidh ag an chóisir leat ag ithe cúpla yokes
lines.english: I just want to be at the party with you taking a few yokes

lines.irish: Ag déanamh cúpla líne bhán don phúdar mín cóc
lines.english: Doing a few white lines of that fine coke powder

lines.irish: Is tiocfaidh deireadh na hoíche ‘s béimid ar fad ag gol den smoke
lines.english: And by the end of the night we’ll all be crying from the smoke

lines.irish: Ach má rugtar orainn inniú
lines.english: But if we get caught today

lines.irish: Is muidinne a bheas thíos leis i bhfaiteadh na súl
lines.english: We’ll be the ones done over in the blink of an eye

lines.irish: Mar tá na muca móra mire sa tóir ar ár meon
lines.english: Because the big pigs are mad, chasing our minds

lines.irish: Is beidh lucht Maghaberry sa tóir ar mo thóin
lines.english: And the Maghaberry lads will be chasing my arse

lines.irish: C.E.A.R.T.A
lines.english: R.I.G.H.T.S

lines.irish: Is cuma liom sa foc faoi aon gharda
lines.english: I don’t give a f*ck about any Garda

lines.irish: Dúidín lasta, tá mise ró-ghasta
lines.english: Roll-up lit, I’m way too fast

lines.irish: Ní fheicfidh tú mise i mo sheasamh ró-fhada
lines.english: You won’t see me standing still too long

lines.irish: Dúirt mé leat cheana, seo an chúis le Balaclava
lines.english: Told you before, this is why we wear balaclavas

lines.irish: Is féidir siúil ar shiúil, ‘s ní aithneoidh siad tada
lines.english: You can walk on by, they won’t recognise a thing

lines.irish: Tá ‘gear’ is fearr in iarthar Bhéal Feirste againn le fada
lines.english: We’ve had the best gear in West Belfast for years

lines.irish: Cóc, speed, e’s agus moll marijuana
lines.english: Coke, speed, Es and piles of marijuana

lines.irish: Ag teacht isteach go ciúin fríd shléibhte Chonamara
lines.english: Coming in quietly through the hills of Connemara

lines.irish: Ag cóisireacht le Tinky Winky agus Seamus Barra
lines.english: Marching with Tinky Winky and Séamus Barra

lines.irish: Ní stopaim ón gheimhreadh fríd go dtí an earrach
lines.english: I don’t stop from winter through to spring

lines.irish: Díolaim snaois le do Mhamó, do mhac ‘is do chara
lines.english: I sell snuff to your granny, your son, and your friend

lines.irish: A n-íocann as má laethanta saoire ar an bhFál Carrach
lines.english: Who pay for their holidays in Falcarragh

lines.irish: Níl aon chathair nach bhfuil muid ann faoi lathair
lines.english: There’s no city we’re not in right now

lines.irish: Doire, Corcaigh agus fiú amháin D4
lines.english: Derry, Cork and even D4

lines.irish: Ag scriosadh na háite ar mhaithe le bheith saibhir
lines.english: Wrecking the place to get rich

lines.irish: Ansin ag déanamh snaois bhán le réaltaí TG4
lines.english: Then doing white snuff with TG4 stars

lines.irish: So goitse anois, agus déanfaimid deifir
lines.english: So come on now, let’s hurry up

lines.irish: Mar tá mise ró-stuama anois faoi láthair
lines.english: Because I’m too slick right now

lines.irish: Agus beidh muid ag dul go maidin le Rónán Mac An Rí
lines.english: And we’ll go ‘til morning with Rónán Mac An Rí

lines.irish: ‘cause’ foc na riallacha atá ag RTÉ
lines.english: ‘Cause f*ck the rules set by RTÉ

lines.irish: C.E.A.R.T.A
lines.english: R.I.G.H.T.S

lines.irish: Is cuma liom sa foc faoi aon gharda
lines.english: I don’t give a f*ck about any Garda

lines.irish: Dúidín lasta, tá mise ró-ghasta
lines.english: Roll-up lit, I’m way too fast

lines.irish: Ní fheicfidh tú mise i mo sheasamh ró-fhada
lines.english: You won’t see me standing still too long

lines.irish: Tógadh Mo Chara agus muid ar an bhealach
lines.english: Mo Chara was taken while we were en route

lines.irish: Cé gur thug mé smack ceart don gharda salach
lines.english: Even though I gave that dirty Garda a good smack

lines.irish: Bhí orm rith na bhaile agus dul ina bhfolach
lines.english: I had to run home and hide

lines.irish: Mar bhí 10 kilo cóc taped ar mo bhrollach
lines.english: ‘Cause I had 10 kilos of coke taped to my chest

lines.irish: Anois ní sin le rá go raibh mé scanraithe
lines.english: Now that’s not to say I was scared

lines.irish: Sure ní íocaim as an "toll" ar an M50
lines.english: I don’t even pay the toll on the M50

lines.irish: Agus rachaidh muid ar aghaidh go dtí go bhfuil gach deor críochnaithe
lines.english: And we’ll keep going until every drop is finished

lines.irish: Raithneach dleathach in focan Éire aontaithe
lines.english: Legal fern in a f*ckin’ united Ireland

“Young man we caught you damaging public property
And you are coming to the station so we can talk properly”

lines.irish: Tá tú ag labhairt le Kneecap is cuma linn sa tsioc
lines.english: You’re talking to Kneecap — we don’t give a damn in the frost

lines.irish: Bím ar Facebook do mháthair ag wankáil like foc
lines.english: I’m on your ma’s Facebook wanking like f*ck

lines.irish: Ag streachailt do m’anáil mar tá do dheirfiúr fliuch
lines.english: Struggling for breath ‘cause your sister’s soaking

lines.irish: Ag tabhairt greadadh do d’athair agus mé lom nocht
lines.english: Slapping your da while I’m butt naked

lines.irish: Mar le tamall anois tá mé as mo mheabhair
lines.english: I’ve been losing my mind for a while now

lines.irish: Déanfaidh mise a bheag duit agus tú os comhair
lines.english: I’ll humble you in front of everyone

lines.irish: Cébí, duine a bhí, mar chuid de do shaol
lines.english: Whoever you are, once part of your life

lines.irish: Brisim achan riail, seachas focan caol le caol
lines.english: I break every rule — except broad with broad, slender with slender

lines.irish: C.E.A.R.T.A
lines.english: R.I.G.H.T.S
